Sql.query: insert into trn_ing_compensacion ( ingcomcodi, pericodi, emprcodi, cabcomcodi, ingcomversion, ingcomimporte, ingcomusername, ingcomfecins ) values ( :ingcomcodi, :pericodi, :emprcodi, :cabcomcodi, :ingcomversion, :ingcomimporte, :ingcomusername, :ingcomfecins )
delete from trn_ing_compensacion where pericodi = :pericodi and ingcomversion = :ingcomversion

select trn_ing_compensacion.*, (select emprnomb from vw_si_empresa where emprcodi=trn_ing_compensacion.emprcodi) as nombEmpresa, (select perinombre from trn_periodo where pericodi=trn_ing_compensacion.pericodi) as nombPeriodo, (select cabcomnombre from trn_cabe_compensacion where cabcomcodi=trn_ing_compensacion.cabcomcodi) as nombCompensacion from trn_ing_compensacion where (pericodi =:pericodi or :pericodi is null ) and (ingcomversion =:ingcomversion or :ingcomversion is null)
select * from trn_ing_compensacion where pericodi = :pericodi and ingcomversion = :ingcomversion
select * from trn_ing_compensacion where pericodi = :pericodi and cabcomcodi = :cabcomcodi and ingcomversion = :ingcomversion and emprcodi = :emprcodi

select distinct e.emprcodi, e.emprnomb as nombempresa from trn_ing_compensacion ic join vw_trn_empresa_str e on ic.emprcodi = e.emprcodi where pericodi = :pericodi and ingcomversion = :ingcomversion order by e.emprnomb

select nvl(sum(ingcomimporte),0) as ingcomimporte from trn_ing_compensacion ic join trn_cabe_compensacion cc on ic.cabcomcodi = cc.cabcomcodi and ic.pericodi = cc.pericodi and cc.cabcomrentconge = 'Si' where ic.pericodi = :pericodi and ic.ingcomversion = :ingcomversion
